note.p: Birth: Clarendon, Jamaica (24 June 1796; Baptised 24 July 1796)
Career: First professor of chemistry at UCL (1828)
Memberships: FRSE; FRCPE; Corresponding Member, Royal Society of Gottingen; FGS; Honorary Member, Plinian Society of Edinburgh; Member, Royal Medical Society of Edinburgh
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1837 No 30 pp 13-14
References: V Gold, 'Samuel Taylor Coleridge and the Appointment of J F Daniell, FRS, as Professor of Chemistry at King's College London' in NR 1973-4 vol 28 pp 25-29
Notes: DNB gives date of death as 13 February 1837 but headstone steates date of death as 12 February 1837. DSB gives year of birth as 1796; left edge of certificate damaged
